## meepctl config gitdir

get/set GIT directory path in the meepctl config file

### Synopsis

Get/Set GIT directory path in the meepctl config file

```
meepctl config gitdir [GIT dir path] [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  meepctl config gitdir /home/some-user/AdvantEDGE
```
